bibl.title: POxy. 4680 y POxy. 4689: compositio y actio.
Lógos hellenikós. Homenaje al Profesor Gaspar Morocho Gayo. I
bibl.author: NODAR DOMÍNGUEZ, Alberto

bibl.note: Studies the distribution of blank spaces in two unpublished papyri preserving passages from Isocrates' De Pace [4680 and 4689 were provisional numbers - both papyri will be edited in a forthcoming volume of the P. Oxy. series: vol. LXX, 4726; 4735]. Using colometry principles and focusing on the 'linear' conception of the text, explores the reasons which may underlie the use of blank spaces as graphic marks for pause, and to what extent these pauses reflect the compositional arrangement of the speech or its actual delivery.
NODAR DOMÍNGUEZ Alberto, POxy. 4680 y POxy. 4689: compositio y actio.
Jesús-Ma. NIETO IBÁÑEZ (Ed.), Lógos hellenikós. Homenaje al Profesor Gaspar Morocho Gayo. I (León, 2003) pp. 355-364.
